channel.title: Help
channel.description: I need help on finding a good source. I am gonna call it Daniel-Scape. The first person to reply gets Co-Owner when i can portforward. So please help me and be helpful. I dont want viruses from crappy sources though! ;D I need to get my router sorted out first as i am not using a router, it is easier to portforward with router as people say so yeah please help! :D
